data.comment: The match is underway at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Genoa in the half of Spezia.
Martin Erlic (Spezia) has received a yellow card from Davide Massa.
Goran Pandev for Genoa is whistled offside.
In the minute 5, Free kick Genoa.
Julian Chabot is booked for the home team.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Goal! M'bala Nzola gives Spezia a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 10, Emmanuel Gyasi with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
Davide Massa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Spezia.
Important block from the Genoa defence as Matteo Ricci fires in a strike for Spezia.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
In the minute 15, Mattia Destro grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Great play from Goran Pandev to set up the goal.
Throw-in Spezia.
In the minute 18, Spezia have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Milan Badelj for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Throw-in for Genoa at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Mattia Destro of Genoa is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 22, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in the half of Spezia.
Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Spezia.
In the minute 26, Giulio Maggiore for Spezia drives towards goal at Stadio Alberto Picco. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 28, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Genoa in La Spezia.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Spezia to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Free kick Spezia.
Goran Pandev (Genoa) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 35, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in for Genoa at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Spezia have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 38, Genoa have a goal kick.
Davide Massa signals a Genoa throw-in in Spezia's half.
Genoa to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
In the minute 42, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
Genoa's Paolo Ghiglione has been booked in La Spezia.
In the minute 44, Spezia drive forward but M'bala Nzola is judged offside.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Spezia.
Genoa's Lukas Lerager has run offside.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) is making a first substitution, with Claudio Terzi replacing Julian Chabot.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Spezia push forward at Stadio Alberto Picco and Nahuel Estevez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Genoa defence.
In the minute 48, Spezia have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Free kick for Genoa in the half of Spezia.
Spezia are coming forward and Emmanuel Gyasi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
Spezia's Giulio Maggiore is on target but unsuccessful.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa.
Throw-in Genoa.
In the minute 54, In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a Genoa throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 57, Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Genoa's area.
In the minute 59, Davide Massa awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Spezia make their second substitution with Giuseppe Mastinu replacing Diego Farias.
In the minute 62, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Davide Ballardini is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Alberto Picco with Davide Zappacosta replacing Paolo Ghiglione.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 66, Miha Zajc is replacing Lukas Lerager for Genoa at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 67, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Genoa.
In the minute 70, Mattia Destro for Genoa has been booked by Davide Massa and receives a first yellow card.
Genoa have been given a penalty...
Claudio Terzi (Spezia) gets booked by Davide Massa, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
In the minute 73, Domenico Criscito converts the penalty to give Genoa a 1-2 lead.
The away team have replaced Valon Behrami with Nicolo Rovella. This is the third substitution made today by Davide Ballardini.
Gianluca Scamacca is replacing Goran Pandev for the away team.
In the minute 75, Miha Zajc (Genoa) gets a yellow card.
The home team have replaced Nahuel Estevez with Paolo Bartolomei. This is the third substitution made today by Vincenzo Italiano.
Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) is making a fourth substitution, with Alessandro Deiola replacing Giulio Maggiore.
In the minute 76, Free kick Spezia.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Spezia have an attacking throw-in.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Genoa.
Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Free kick for Genoa in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Mattia Destro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Genoa.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 82, Davide Massa awards Genoa a goal kick.
Davide Massa awards the away team a throw-in.
Roberto Piccoli of Spezia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Davide Ballardini is making the team's fifth substitution at Stadio Alberto Picco with Marko Pjaca replacing Mattia Destro.
In the minute 84, Roberto Piccoli is replacing Matteo Ricci for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 85, Can Spezia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genoa's half?
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Genoa at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 87, Davide Massa blows against Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca for offside.
Davide Massa awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Spezia's Paolo Bartolomei gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Davide Massa awards Genoa a goal kick.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Genoa drives forward and Gianluca Scamacca gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Spezia.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Gianluca Scamacca of Genoa gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in La Spezia.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
